Articles.Content:
Which kerbals' look do you prefer, the old ksp 1 kerbals, or the new customisable kerbals from ksp 2? I preferred the old ones but I can understand if you like the new ones.

Edited May 29, 2020 by Aniruddh

I really do like the og kerbals...but the new guys have a nicer skin tone (I’m not racsit, it’s just their skin is the exact color of my puke when I was once violently sick. Just can’t look at them the same way I used too) but I really like the style of the og kerbals hair, except how it look flat...I did like the female kerbal’s hair best, it turned out really well. But the customizable hair...does it really matter? How much time does the average player spend looking at their kerbal’s hair? Use the time spent on the hair on something better, like switching the ui to look more like ksps ui...

But the new guys get suits you can customize. Bonus point for that, but ksp’s suits look really nice..
I prefer the skin tone of the older kerbals, their 'lime' green colour is an easter egg . They forgot about that when they changed their skin colour to a dark green in ksp 2.
Which one is closer to the Minecraft creepers?

3 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:

Which one is closer to the Minecraft creepers?

Ksp 1 kerbals? The new ones are too dark a skin tone to match the minecraft creepers.
So, the KSP 1 ones are closer to the burst-and-fly ideology.

What I would greatly appreciate in Kerbal improvement is adjustable or higher position of eyes.

Because when they sit in historically accurate Gemini capsule, the windows are above their eyes.

Edited May 29, 2020 by kerbiloid

but... i dont want to hurt their feelings They are all so freaking adorable.

 

This is like trying to pick a favorite child

The KSP 1 Kerbals look like they were made in a day after watching a character rigging tutorial, so I much prefer the KSP 2 Kerbals which don't have an oddly flat texture to them and hair that bends spacetime around the top of their skulls.

1 hour ago, justspace103 said:

but... i dont want to hurt their feelings They are all so freaking adorable.

 

This is like trying to pick a favorite child

You said it man

1 hour ago, justspace103 said:

i dont want to hurt their feelings They are all so freaking adorable

Should I add a 'both' or 'none' option? I thought that would ruin the point of the poll, but if people ask I can add it.

We can all agree that all of the kerbals are adorable, right? 

I think they’re just delightful. To watch Jeb laugh his ‘lil head off while Bill and Bob and screaming bloody murder.
